title: decision-data-v1
description: Decision data used to notify coordinator that a decision has been made

application_id.description: The application id for which decision has been made

light_touch_review.description: Set to true if review period is to be light touch

review_date.description: Award review date if decision outcome is allowed

award_start_date.description: Award start date if decision outcome is allowed

award_end_date.description: Award end date if decision outcome is allowed. In case award is ongoing, this date is set to 2099-12-12

payable_from_date.description: Payable from date if decision outcome is allowed

decision_date.description: Date when a decision has been made
